channel.title: Help pl0x
channel.description: Title says it all, i need to know how to make some one not trade. (not a staff member) A player. If anyone could possibly help/tell me it'd help me alot. thank-you.

item.title: Help pl0x
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:14, topic:428232”]where trading is handled, (The trading packet)

if (player.playerUsername.equals("Name")) {
    player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Your ability to trade has been disabled.");
    return;
}

You’re going to have to convert it to whatever you use, but you should get the drift.[/quote]
Thanks bro. <3

Read full topic

item.title: Help pl0x
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

where trading is handled, (The trading packet)

if (player.playerUsername.equals("Name")) {
    player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Your ability to trade has been disabled.");
    return;
}

You’re going to have to convert it to whatever you use, but you should get the drift.

Read full topic

item.title: Help pl0x
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

[quote=“mike0631, post:12, topic:428232”]Thats not going to work

In trade.java under

public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
int tradeId = c.getInStream().readSignedWordBigEndian();
c.getPA().resetFollow();[/code]

add

if(c.playerRights == 0) {
c.sendMessage("Trading as an play has been disabled.");
return;
}

This is for [PI] , you have pi to :)[/quote]
I only want one player to not be able to trade, not all.

Read full topic

item.title: Help pl0x
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

neroxx:

Can you post the first 30 lines from config.java? so i can see? i think i maybe got tha answer xD

[code]
package server;

public class Config {

public static final boolean SERVER_DEBUG = false;// needs to be false for
													// Real world to work

public static final String SERVER_NAME = "ResistancePK";
public static final String WELCOME_MESSAGE = "";
public static final String FORUMS = "";

public static final int CLIENT_VERSION = 456987;

public static int MESSAGE_DELAY = 6000;
public static final int ITEM_LIMIT = 23000;
public static final int MAXITEM_AMOUNT = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
public static final int BANK_SIZE = 352;
public static final int MAX_PLAYERS = 1024;
public static final int MAX_OBJECTS = 500;

public static final int CONNECTION_DELAY = 100;
public static final int IPS_ALLOWED = 4;

public static final boolean WORLD_LIST_FIX = false;

public static final int[] ITEM_SELLABLE = { 20072, 12158, 12159, 12160,
		12161, 12162, 12163, 12164, 12165, 12166, 12167, 12168, 3842, 3844,
		3840, 8844, 8845, 8846, 8847, 8848, 8849, 8850, 10551, 7462,
		7461, 7460, 7459, 7458, 7457, 7456, 7455, 7454, 8839, 8840, 8842,
		11663, 11664, 11665, 10499, 9748, 9754, 9751, 9769, 9757, 9760,
		9763, 9802, 9808, 9784, 9799, 9805, 9781, 9796, 9793, 9775, 9772,
		9778, 9787, 9811, 9766, 9749, 9755, 9752, 9770, 9758, 9761, 9764,
		9803, 9809, 9785, 9800, 9806, 9782, 9797, 9794, 9776, 9773, 9779,
		9788, 9812, 9767, 9747, 9753, 9750, 9768, 9756, 9759, 9762, 9801,
		9807, 9783, 9798, 9804, 9780, 9795, 9792, 9774, 9771, 9777, 9786,
		9810, 9765, 995, 15221, 15222 }; // what items can't be sold in any store[/code]
